item.title: Taking John The Ripper for a spin
item.description: It is time time to give John The Ripper as spin (further referred to as simpy “John”). It is a open-source password cracker similar to hashcat from the previous post. First, we need to install it. There are three versions to choose from. PRO - distributed primarily in the form of “native” packages for the target operating systems and in general is meant to be easier to install. Not free.
